channel.title: I need major help and someone with great skills in makeing servers!
channel.description: ok i wana make a game thats a whole lot diferent the runescape as my privet server.... i want to make diferent wepons make the people look diferent have diferent monsters have diferent skills and more importantly make it more like a moder day game (guns, dif looking banks dif looking stores) some poeple may say this sounds gay but i would realy like it if someone would help me with this i just need a person with great knowledge of making scripts.... plz sombody help me!!!!!!!
